mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mypill ( pill_no, pill_name, pill_count, pill_start, pill_end, pill_alerttime, pill_color, mem_no ) VALUES ( mypill_seq.nextval, #{pill_name}, #{pill_count}, #{pill_start}, #{pill_end}, #{pill_alerttime}, #{pill_color}, #{mem_no} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mypill WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no} and sysdate between to_date(replace(SUBSTRB(pill_start,0,10),'-',''),'yyyymmdd') and to_date(replace(SUBSTRB(pill_end,0,10),'-',''),'yyyymmdd')

SELECT * FROM mypill WHERE MEM_NO = #{mem_no} and (to_date(replace(SUBSTRB(pill_start,0,10),'-',''),'yyyymmdd') between TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'d'),'yyyymmdd') and TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'d')+6,'yyyymmdd')) or (to_date(replace(SUBSTRB(pill_end,0,10),'-',''),'yyyymmdd') between TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'d'),'yyyymmdd') and TO_CHAR(TRUNC(sysdate,'d')+6,'yyyymmdd'))
mapper.update: update mypill set pill_no = #{pill_no}, pill_name = #{pill_name}, pill_count = #{pill_count}, pill_start = #{pill_start}, pill_end = #{pill_end}, pill_alerttime = #{pill_alerttime}, pill_color = #{pill_color}, mem_no = #{mem_no} where pill_no = #{pill_no}
